description: The Block Component is part of the Bootstrap Professional Marketing theme.

inverse.description: use the inverse color style for this block

text.description: body text underneath the block title

title.description: main title text in the block

muteText.description: use a muted text style for the body text in the block

background.description: a react component to use as an interactive background for this block

children.description: additional content will be displayed under the block title in the block foreground

angled.description: use the angled style variation of this block

bordered.description: use the bordered style variation of this block

fillHeight.description: when enabled this block will occupy the full height of the parent container
